thread.title_full: 'Phillauri' song 'Dum Dum' out! Anushka Sharma and Diljit Dosanjh's soulful romance will mesmerise you - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: 'Phillauri' song 'Dum Dum' out! Anushka Sharma and Diljit Dosanjh's soulful romance will mesmerise you
text:
Anushka Sharma and Diljit Dosanjh in 'Dum Dum' song from 'Phillauri'. Pic/YouTube 
The first song 'Dum Dum' from Anushka Sharma and Diljit Dosanjh's 'Phillauri' is out! The soulful Sufi music picturised on the lead pair is sure to leave you mesmerised!
Watch 'Dum Dum' song video: 

'Phillauri' is Anushka Sharma's second home production, first being 'NH10'. Shot extensively in the picturesque and colourful state of Punjab, the film also Suraj Sharma and Mehreen Pirzada.
The shoot had begun on Baisakhi earlier 2016 in a start-to-finish schedule that wrapped up by June end.
'Phillauri' will release on March 31.
In case you've missed the trailer, watch it here !
